feedback.text: Remove irrelevant content like 'Adam's Bio is here'
feedback.reasoning: This content does not provide any value to the reader in the context of chatbot optimization. It is better to focus on relevant information.

feedback.text: Clearly define the topic of the article at the beginning
feedback.reasoning: Setting clear expectations for the reader from the beginning will help them understand the purpose of the article and stay engaged.

feedback.text: Expand on the secondary topics mentioned
feedback.reasoning: Providing more detailed information on the secondary topics will enhance the reader's understanding and make the article more informative.

feedback.text: Define the intent of the article and ensure it aligns with the topic
feedback.reasoning: Having a clear intent will help the author stay focused and deliver the information effectively to the reader.

feedback.text: Include relevant keywords related to chatbot optimization throughout the article
feedback.reasoning: Using targeted keywords will improve the article's visibility in search engines and attract readers interested in chatbot optimization.
